precaution: Remove any objects you may knock off from the table
instruction: Sit at a table with a wallet placed in front of you.
Place your right hand near the wallet.
Hold the wallet with your left hand.
Use your right hand to unzip the wallet slowly.
Use your right hand to reach into the coin pocket.
Pinch and remove one coin using your fingers.
Place the coin on the table.
Pinch and remove one more coin using your fingers.
Place the coin on the table.
Place the wallet on the table.
